verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O Thou in whose presence
My soul takes delight,
On Whom in affliction I call

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
My Comfort by day
And my Song in the night,
My Hope, my Salvation, my All!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Where dost Thou, dear Shepherd,
Resort with Thy sheep.
To feed them in pastures of love?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Say, why in the valley,
Of death should I weep,
Or alone in this wilderness rove?

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O, why should I wander,
An alien from Thee,
Or cry in the desert
For bread?

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Thy foes will rejoice,
When my sorrows they see,
And smile at the tears,
I have shed.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Ye daughters of Zion declare,
Have you seen the star,
That on Israel shone.
Say if in your tents,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
My beloved has been,
And where with His flocks
He is gone.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
He looks! And ten thousands
Of angels rejoice,
And myriads wait for His word.

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
He speaks! And eternity,
Filled with His voice,
Re-echoes the praise of the Lord.

verse.name: v6a
v6b
verse.lines:
Restore and defend me,
For Thou art my all,
And in Thee I will ever rejoice.
